akn:section.akn:heading: Street improvements; availability of Forest Service funds

akn:content.akn:p: § 555b. Street improvements; availability of Forest Service funds Funds available to the Forest Service shall be available for expenses of, or payment of assessment for, construction of sidewalks, curbs, or street paving along the boundary of Government-owned residential or otherwise improved lots. (Pub. L. 87–869, § 9, Oct. 23, 1962, 76 Stat. 1157.)
